Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.SFMLNativeTransformable
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.SFMLNativeTransformable
org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.Shape
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoundsObject, Drawable, SceneObject, Transformable, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
org.jsfml.graphics.CircleShape, org.jsfml.graphics.ConvexShape, org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape
public abstract class Shape extends org.jsfml.graphics.Shape implements Drawable, SceneObject
Abstract base class for (optionally) textured shapes with (optional) outlines.

    • isCentered

      public boolean isCentered()
      Returns whether this Shape is set to be centered.
      Specified by:
      isCentered in interface SceneObject
      Returns:
      true if this Shape is set to be centered, false otherwise.

    • setCentered

      public void setCentered(boolean centered)
      Sets whether this Shape has to be centered by keeping its origin at the center of its local bounds. If the origin is changed manually after this shape is set to be centered, it will be set back to the center of the sprite whenever its size changes.
      Specified by:
      setCentered in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      centered - true to keep this Shape centered, false to reset the origin to the point (0,0)

    • getTexture

      public ConstTexture getTexture()
      Gets the shape's current texture.
      Specified by:
      getTexture in interface SceneObject
      Returns:
      the shape's current texture

    • setTexture

      public final void setTexture(@Nullable @Nullable ConstTexture texture)
      Sets the texture of the shape without affecting the texture rectangle, unless the texture is set to be tileable. If this Sprite has this texture already applied, this method does nothing. The texture may be null if no texture is to be used.
      Specified by:
      setTexture in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      texture - the texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used

    • setTexture

      public void setTexture(@Nullable @Nullable ConstAnimatedTexture texture)
      Sets the animated texture of the shape without affecting the texture rectangle. The texture may be null if no animated texture is to be used.
      Specified by:
      setTexture in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      texture - the animated texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used

    • setTexture

      public void setTexture(@Nullable @Nullable ConstTexture texture, boolean resetRect)
      Sets the texture of the shape. If this Sprite has this texture already applied, this method does nothing. The texture may be null if no texture is to be used.
      Specified by:
      setTexture in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      texture - the texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used
      resetRect - true to reset the texture rect, false otherwise (this setting is ignored if texture is tileable)

    • setTexture

      public void setTexture(@Nullable @Nullable ConstAnimatedTexture texture, boolean resetRect)
      Sets the animated texture of the shape. The texture may be null if no texture is to be used.
      Specified by:
      setTexture in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      texture - the animated texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used
      resetRect - true to reset the texture rect, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • updateAnimatedTexture

      public void updateAnimatedTexture(@NotNull @NotNull Time elapsedTime)
      Updates this texture for this shape. This method is run by the scene loop and does not need to be invoked manualy.
      Specified by:
      updateAnimatedTexture in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - the time since the game started

    • getTextureRect

      public IntRect getTextureRect()
      Gets the shape's current texture portion.
      Specified by:
      getTextureRect in interface SceneObject
      Returns:
      the shape's current texture portion

    • setTextureRect

      public void setTextureRect(@NotNull @NotNull IntRect rect)
      Sets the portion of the texture that will be used for drawing. An empty rectangle can be passed to indicate that the whole texture shall be used. The width and / or height of the rectangle may be negative to indicate that the respective axis should be flipped. For example, a width of -32 will result in a sprite that is 32 pixels wide and flipped horizontally.
      Specified by:
      setTextureRect in interface SceneObject
      Parameters:
      rect - the texture portion

    • setOrigin

      public void setOrigin(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2f origin)
      Sets the rotation, scaling and drawing origin of this shape. If this method is called when this shape is set to be centered, it will be set back to the center of the shape whenever its size changes.
      Specified by:
      setOrigin in interface Transformable
      Overrides:
      setOrigin in class SFMLNativeTransformable
      Parameters:
